page.description: Defines the list of items to display Only available if the *[link:Navigator type@ux panel navigator type]* for the Panel Navigator is set to *[ui:List]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:List definition]* property defines the items that appear in the List shown for navigating the Panel Navigator. The List can be defined as a tree structure, allowing you to specify a cascading List to navigate the application. Selecting a 'leaf' item in the List navigates to the corresponding Panel defined in the *[ui:Target Panel]* property for the leaf.

section.title: Branch Properties
section.description: Branch items can be configured using the following properties:

item.name: Item
item.description: The text shown in the List or button collection for the Branch item.

item.name: Icon
item.description: The Icon shown for the Branch item.

item.name: Child list style
item.description: Specify the style for the child list. You can use either a List or a collection of buttons. when you use the 'buttons' option, you can group the buttons into categories and put arbitrary HTML text between buttons.

item.name: Security Groups
item.description: Select which security groups can see this the Branch item. If no groups are selected, all users can see the object.

item.name: Server-side Show/hide expression
item.description: Specify an expression to determine if the Branch item should be shown. Session variables may be used in the expression. The item is shown if the expression is blank or evaluates to *[xb:.t.]*. If the expression cannot be evaluated or evaluates to *[xb:.f.]*, ,the Branch item is not shown.

section.title: Leaf Properties
section.description: Leaf items can be configured using the following properties:

item.name: Item type
item.description: Specify if the item is a List item, which can be clicked to navigate to a Panel, or a heading. Options are *[ui:Item]* or *[ui:Heading]*.

item.name: Item
item.description: The text shown in the List or button collection for the Leaf item. Available only if the *[ui:Item type]* is set to "Item".

item.name: Icon
item.description: The Icon shown for the Leaf item. Available only if the *[ui:Item type]* is set to "Item".

item.name: Target Panel
item.description: Specifies the Panel that should be shown when the Leaf item is clicked. Available only if the *[ui:Item type]* is set to "Item".

item.name: Heading text
item.description: Text to display in the heading. Available only if the *[ui:Item type]* is set to "Heading".

item.name: Security Groups
item.description: Select which security groups can see this the Leaf item. If no groups are selected, all users can see the object.

item.name: Server-side Show/hide expression
item.description: Specify an expression to determine if the Leaf item should be shown. Session variables may be used in the expression. The item is shown if the expression is blank or evaluates to *[xb:.t.]*. If the expression cannot be evaluated or evaluates to *[xb:.f.]*, ,the Leaf item is not shown.

description.p: The List can be displayed as a list of buttons or a List. To set how the List options are displayed, click *[ui:Set List Properties...]* and select from the list of options.
